desc: Don't die.
Can be used to craft traps and weapons.
Trap. With acorn as a bait. Enemies get damage when walk onto it. Crafted from branch and acorn.
textWhenFirstMeet: 1:A trap! You can use it to chase away other animals by moving them on top of it.

desc: Leaf generated when a card is used, swap to consume it
Enemy. Walks to player, deals damage equals its hit points.
textWhenFirstMeet: 1:a sneaky weasel! Try not get close to it as it might bite you!

desc: Enemy. When chased away, would left an item on the ground.
Enemy. When there are 2 or more traps and weapons around, would fly away.

textWhenFirstMeet: 1:a sneaky fox! It would attack every 4 rounds so chase it away before that!

desc: Weapon. Deals damage to enemies around it.

textWhenFirstMeet: 1:You heard a low growl deep in the forest|3:The growl getting closer and closer…
1:nuts on the tree! Try hit them to the ground and collect them! You can stack them on the ground.

desc: Edible, heals player when eaten.
A friendly hedgehog, enemy would walk to and attack him too. Keep him alive if you can!
Trap. Enemies get damage when walk onto it. Crafted from nut and tumbleweed.
Weapon. Would exchange position with enemy before attack. Crafted from two tumbleweeds
Enemy. When swap, reduces the other one's hit points by half.
Enemy. Heal other enemies before attack.
Enemy. Stomp on cards around it and deal damage equals to half of their hit points
Enemy. Would steal food around and heal itself before attack.
Edible, heals player when eaten. Happy Halloween!
Weapon. Taste good. If didn't kill enemy, would heal it instead.
Trap. A candy made with hawthorn. Enemies would get attract to it as it is a player. Enemies get damage when walk onto it. Crafted from branch and hawthorn.
Edible, heals player when eaten. Sweet and sour and smells good.
Weapon. Would attack all enemy on that direction.  Crafted from tumbleweed and branch
Trap. Attract  enemies. Deals damage to 3x3 enemies around it.
A friendly Blaumeise. Keep him alive if you can!
You can drag and place a tetris shape next to existed cards on board
You can right click to rotate the current tetris shape
You can swap two cards on board, once per round
Hover over enemy to see its target and next move
Right click on card to show its info again
Come here!
